PGN Sabet Tiga Penghargaan di BUMN Branding & Marketing Award
06 Nov 2019, 11:05 by Angga Laraspati
Jakarta - Di penghujung tahun 2019, PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk (PGN) mendapatkan penghargaan dari BUMN Track, BUMN Branding and Marketing Award 2019. Tidak tanggung-tanggung, PGN meraih 3 penghargaan sekaligus pada ajang ini.
Sebagai Sub-holding gas bumi di Indonesia, PGN sukses meraih tiga penghargaan sekaligus. Yaitu, The Best Indicator Global Anak Perusahaan BUMN, Tbk, Creative Competition Strategy Terbaik (Corporate Marketing) Anak Perusahaan, dan The Best CMO Anak Perusahaan kepada Direktur Komersial PGN, Dilo Seno Widagdo.
Sesuai pendapat juri, sebagai The Best CMO, Dilo Seno Widagdo menunjukkan kemampuannya menerapkan mindset dan menggiring perusahaan menjadi world class company.
"Tentunya ada rasa bangga atas pencapaian ini. Kami juga berterima kasih kepada semua pihak yang telah bekerja keras sehingga dapat menyukseskan upaya PGN untuk berkomitmen menjalankan perannya sehingga dapat diakui secara global," ujar Dilo Seno Widagdo dalam keterangan tertulis, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Pada ajang kali ini, sebanyak 92 perusahaan BUMN dan Anak Perusahaan BUMN di Indonesia ikut serta. Pada prosesnya, seleksi dilakukan untuk mengerucutkan jumlah peserta menjadi 77 perusahaan setelah melalui tahap kedua berupa wawancara dan presentasi di depan juri.
Pada tahun ini, kategori Indikator Global merupakan kategori tambahan. Menurut Ketua Dewan Juri, Prof Rhenald Kasali, kekuatan branding di era Industri 4.0 memicu persaingan tidak hanya dalam lingkup nasional, tetapi juga lingkup global. Digital marketing digital telah membuat BUMN mampu bersaing di luar batas dan memiliki kualitas dengan global mindset.
PGN juga telah bersinergi dengan PT Pertamina GAS (Pertagas) dan entitas anak usahanya. Saat ini PGN merupakan salah satu perusahaan energi gas terbesar di ASEAN. Ini menunjukan bahwa PGN sudah menunjukan tajinya sebagai world class company.
PGN memiliki pipa gas yang saat ini hampir dua kali lipat dari jaringan gas milik Malaysia dan Thailand, serta empat kali lipat lebih panjang daripada jaringan gas di Singapura. PGN pun telah memiliki 10.000 KM sambungan pipa dan mampu melayani lebih dari 350.000 pelanggan di semua sektor. Mulai dari kelistrikan, industri, komersial, UMKM, transportasi, dan rumah tangga.
Kami bersyukur bahwa PGN kembali mampu membuktikan perannya sebagai Sub-Holding gas bumi di Indonesia. Dalam setiap langkah untuk menjalankan peran strategisnya, PGN diiringi dengan berbagai pertimbangan seluruh aspek. Serta terobosan yang inovasi dan kreativitas juga sangat perlu dilakukan. Tanpa hal itu, langkah kami tidak akan sampai pada tahap ini," ujar sekretaris perusahaan PGN, Rachmat Hutama.
Sebagai contoh, program PGN 360 Degree Integrated Solution. Program ini menjadi bagian dari upaya perusahaan untuk memberikan kemudahan kepada pelanggan dalam mendapatkan layanan secara menyeluruh. Mulai dari penyediaan gas hingga layanan pendukung lainnya dari hulu sampai hilir. PGN 360 degree juga merupakan langkah pembaruan PGN untuk mendukung pembangunan smart city di Indonesia.
Dalam rangka mewujudkan penyediaan energi gas bumi, program pembangunan infrastruktur yang akan dibangun diantaranya membangun jaringan pipa distribusi sepanjang 500 km, pipa transmisi 528 KM, 5 FSRU, 7 LNG filling station untuk truk/kapal, 3,59 juta sambungan rumah tangga, dan 17 fasilitas LNG untuk mensuplai kebutuhan berbagai segmen konsumen.
"Infrastruktur gas bumi merupakan investasi jangka panjang dengan risiko pasokan dan pasar yang belum terjamin. Namun risiko itu diambil PGN sebagai pionir pemanfaatan gas bumi agar ketahanan energi nasional semakin kokoh." tandas Rachmat.
Upaya pemenuhan pasokan gas berbagai sumber dan dukungan infrastruktur yang dibangun, diharapkan bisa semakin menuntun PGN menjadi perusahaan energi kelas dunia yang mampu memenuhi kebutuhan energi secara efisien.
Walaupun terdapat banyak kendala dan tantangan, PGN berkomitmen untuk selalu mengembangkan infraskrutur gas bumi yang mampu menjangkau semua segmen pasar

text:
PGN won three awards at BUMN Branding & Marketing Award
Nov 06 2019, 11:05 by Angga Laraspati
Jakarta - At the end of 2019, PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk (PGN) received an award from BUMN Track, BUMN Branding and Marketing Award 2019. No half-hearted, PGN won 3 awards at once in this event.
As a Sub-holding of natural gas in Indonesia, PGN successfully won three awards at the same time. Namely, The Global Best Indicator of a Subsidiary Company of BUMN, Tbk, the Best Creative Competition Strategy (Corporate Marketing) of a Subsidiary, and The Best CMO of a Subsidiary to the Commercial Director of PGN, Dilo Seno Widagdo.
According to the jury's opinion, as The Best CMO, Dilo Seno Widagdo showed his ability to apply the mindset and lead the company to become a world class company.
"Certainly there is a sense of pride for this achievement. We also thank all those who have worked so hard to succeed PGN's efforts to commit to carry out their role so that it can be recognized globally," Dilo Seno Widagdo said in a written statement, Wednesday (6/11 / 2019).
In this event, as many as 92 BUMN companies and BUMN subsidiaries in Indonesia participated. In the process, selection was made to narrow the number of participants to 77 companies after going through the second stage of interviews and presentations in front of the judges.
This year, the Global Indicators category is an additional category. According to the Chairman of the Jury, Prof. Rhenald Kasali, the strength of branding in the Industrial 4.0 era triggered competition not only in the national sphere, but also in the global sphere. Digital digital marketing has made SOEs able to compete beyond borders and have quality with a global mindset.
PGN has also synergized with PT Pertamina GAS (Pertagas) and its subsidiary entities. Currently PGN is one of the largest gas energy companies in ASEAN. This shows that PGN has shown its strength as a world class company.
PGN has a gas pipeline that is now almost twice that of the Malaysian and Thai gas networks, and four times longer than the gas network in Singapore. PGN also has 10,000 KM of pipe connections and is able to serve more than 350,000 customers in all sectors. Starting from electricity, industry, commercial, MSME, transportation, and household.
We are grateful that PGN has once again been able to prove its role as natural gas sub-holding in Indonesia. In every step to carry out its strategic role, PGN is accompanied by various considerations in all aspects. As well as breakthroughs that innovation and creativity also need to be done. Without that, our steps will not reach this stage, "said PGN's corporate secretary, Rachmat Hutama.
For example, the PGN 360 Degree Integrated Solution program. This program is part of the company's efforts to make it easy for customers to get comprehensive services. Starting from the provision of gas to other supporting services from upstream to downstream. PGN 360 degree is also a step to renew PGN to support the development of smart cities in Indonesia.
In order to realize the supply of natural gas energy, the infrastructure development program that will be built includes building a 500 km distribution pipeline, 528 KM transmission pipeline, 5 FSRU, 7 LNG filling stations for trucks / ships, 3.59 million household connections, and 17 LNG facilities to supply the needs of various consumer segments.
"Natural gas infrastructure is a long-term investment with supply and market risks that have not been guaranteed. However, the risk is taken by PGN as a pioneer in the utilization of natural gas so that national energy security becomes stronger." said Rachmat.
The effort to meet the supply of gas from various sources and support the infrastructure that is built, is expected to further guide PGN to become a world-class energy company capable of meeting energy needs efficiently.
Although there are many obstacles and challenges, PGN is committed to always developing natural gas infrastructure that is able to reach all market segments
